title: Strengthening Competencies in Inclusive Educational Technology Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Educational Technology and Understanding Disabilities
context.additional_context: Aims to develop inclusive educational design competencies in smartphone-based limited technological environments, requiring practical approaches considering legal and technological infrastructure gaps.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to design customized educational content for specific disability types using smartphone-based tools.
Learners will be able to analyze legal requirements (e.g., Indiaâ€™s Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act) when applying inclusive educational technologies.
Learners will be able to propose methods for integrating Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles into technology-supported learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
